author: Hayley Minn
title: Stephen Bear admits to cheating on Charlotte Crosby as he's FINALLY confronted on Celebs Go Dating
text:
Stephen Bear admits to cheating on Charlotte Crosby as he's FINALLY confronted on Celebs Go Dating Body language expert Judi James put the Celebrity Big Brother winner in his place Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bear forced into admitting Charlotte Crosby relationship Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Celebs Go Dating viewers have known Stephen Bear was going to be kicked off the show for ages - due to his relationship with Charlotte Crosby. 
The Ex On The Beach star has been getting into SO much trouble on the E4 show over the past three weeks. 
And, in tonight’s episode, body language expert Judi James FINALLY confronted him about the fact he’d been keeping the romance a secret from dating agents Nadia Essex and Eden Blackman. 
Judi said: “You’re going on dates and at the same time, there’s pictures of you in the paper with someone else.” Read More Charlotte Crosby And Stephen Bear Tease New MTV Show (Photo: MTV) (Photo: Channel 4) 
Watching on a screen, Nadia said to Eden: “She’s asked if he’s seeing someone else!” 
Bear then admitted to seeing a girl - Charlotte - and seemingly also confessed to cheating on her! 
He replied: “You only get seen with one, but I could be kissing a few girls.” 
After further questioning, the Celebrity Big Brother winner confessed: “There is one main girl I’m seeing outside the agency and we’re having a very good time.” 
Nadia then exclaimed: “I knew it!” Read More (Photo: Channel 4) (Photo: Channel 4) 
Voiceover man Rob Beckett then added: “We ALL knew it, he’s been dating Charlotte Crosby for f**k’s sake!” 
Nadia was SO angry, and added: “He has zero respect for us and any of our clients!” 
And viewers were fuming with Bear too, with one saying: “Has bear just admitted to cheating on charlotte already. I see 1 girl but kiss loads #CelebsGoDating.” 
Another added: “Caught out! Bear is just a vile human #CelebsGoDating.” 
*Celebs Go Dating continues on E4 on Monday at 10pm Like us on Facebook
